text:
@yashar My Dad died of AIDS in '93. Hearing this, back then, scared heteros would ask me if he was gay. When I said yes, I think it made them feel safer, distanced from the virus.
I'm no doctor, but AIDS didn't discriminate & I'm thinking Covid-19 can kill, underlying condition or not.
